K10sf74_sc:1: evaṁ mayā śrutam ekasmiṁ samaye bhagavāṁ rājagṛhe viharati devadattaṁ lābha satkāra
K10sf74_sc:2: ślokam ārabhya bhikṣūn āmantrayati / candropamā bhikṣavo viharata / nityaṁ navakā
K10sf74_sc:3: iva hrīmantaḥ kuleṣv apragalbhā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkramata /
K10sf74_sc:4: tad yathā cakṣuṣmāṁ puruṣo jarodapānaṁ vā nadīdurgaṁ vā parvata viṣamaṁ vā avakṛṣya
K10sf74_sc:5: kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ vyavalokayed evam eva candropamā viharata nityaṁ navakā iva
K10sf74_sc:6: hrīmantaḥ kuleṣv apragalbhā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkramata /
K10sf74_sc:7: kāśyapo hi bhikṣuś candropamo viharati nityaṁ navaka iva hrīmān kuleṣv apragalbho
K10sf74_sc:8: ’vakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkramati / tad yathā cakṣuṣmāṁ puruṣo
K10sf74_sc:9: jarodapānaṁ vā nadī durgaṁ vā parvata viṣamaṁ vā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ vyavalokayed
K10sf74_sc:10: evam eva kāśyapo hi bhikṣuś candropamo viharati nityaṁ navaka iva hrīmāṁ kuleṣv apragalbhaḥ
K10sf74_sc:11: avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkrāmati / kiṁ manyatha …
